content: your cute little penguin friend helps you to keep your chicken egg warm and cozy for your comfy breakfast for an eu egg size of m 53−63g might also work for size l 63−73g untested the eyes and the beak is embroidered flippers and feet are crocheted in and not sewed in materials needed - 6 mm crochet hook - sewing needle - stitch markers - 3 yarn colors black ~11g white ~3g and orange ~3g
